moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows SMB Multi Dropper
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module dependent on the given filename extension creates either
          a .lnk, .scf, .url, .xml, or desktop.ini file which includes a reference
          to the the specified remote host, causing SMB connections to be initiated
          from any user that views the file.
author: Richard Davy - secureyourit.co.uk
Lnk Creation Code by Mubix
asoto-r7

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: DisablePayloadHandler
options.description: Disable the handler code for the selected payload

options.name: LHOST
options.description: Host listening for incoming SMB/WebDAV traffic
